entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CDT Sunday 2 April 2023
